scripts.loadtest: curl http://127.0.0.1:3000 && ab -n 1000 -c 100 http://127.0.0.1:3000/ || echo -e "\033[0;31mPlease start the server first\033[0m"
scripts.deploy: git commit -am "Deploying" || true; git push; ssh -i ../project.pem -t ec2-user@54.88.199.117 "cd AngelHack2017; git commit -am stuff; git pull; killall -9 nginx; sudo /jet/bin/forever start api/.; sudo /jet/bin/forever start api/proxy.js;"
